landingPage.title: Welcome to Project Air
landingPage.subtitle: An application to manage IoT Assets

highlights.title: Engage
highlights.content: Handle all IoT related requests in a single place to manage gateways, manage devices, view device data.

highlights.title: Collaborate
highlights.content: Collaborate on open and interoperable IoT solutions built on open standards

highlights.title: Track
highlights.content: Track and respond to high priority devices using alerts and actions
